text: (O popol se vi hav any dub resurrection memor ke) ni kre vi polv subsequently tiny gut turn into pend (embryo) tiam gxi igx fetus don life deemed lifeless! Ni tiel clarify ajx vi. Ni sald wombs whatever ni testament por predetermined period! Ni tiam bring vi out infants tiam vi reach maturity. While kelk da vi mort jun others viv al mav agx nur al trov out ke neni knowledge ating nepr lim! Ankaux vi rigard land est dead tiam as baldaux as ni dusx gxi akv gxi vibr life kresk all kinds da bel plant
